text: Percy-en-Auge is a former commune that is in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune Mézidon Vallée d'Auge.Arrêté préfectoral 16 September 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Percy-en-Auge
